document_data.caption: A map showing the River Dolsel in the Guthland.
document_data.name: River Dolsel
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Dolsel''' was a river in the [[Guthland]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]].
document_data.Geography: The river started in the [[Dolsel Gap]] and drained into the [[Thingulph]].
document_data.Trade: The river was the heart of trade in the region. Merchants and fishermen used [[wikipedia:scow|scows]] to transport fruit along the smooth river to the markets of [[Delselar]].
document_data.Inhabitants:
[[Snake]]s, living and [[undead]], slithered from the dark regions of the [[Black Jungles]] to hunt for prey, under the guidence of the [[yuan-ti]].

=
